headline: Bausch Health Appoints New Chief Accounting Officer
summary: LAVAL, QC / ACCESS Newswire / July 10, 2025 / Bausch Health Companies Inc. (NYSE:BHC)(TSX:BHC), a global, diversified pharmaceutical company, today announced the appointment of Steven Lee as Senior Vice President, Controller and Chief Accounting Officer, ...
